|wi1_if_name = |rad1chip1cpu = true |rad1chip2 = Thomson;DM6201C; |rad1oui = <!-- Only if different from above OUI --> |rad1_ant_conn = U.FL |rad1stand = IEEE 802.11b/g |rad1g = 54 |rad1b = 11 |rad1freq = 2.4
}}{{TIDTOC|embedded}} ==Overview== "NM-103-BB" and "323A702403I7" is silkscreened on the module board (CX870-3HB). :[[BridgeCo]] DM870A + [[Thomson]] 6201C (Eagle) - ''[[Lite-On]]'' (323) module ? :The MAC label on the board has a 00:07:F5 (''BridgeCo'') OUI.
"LOGIC 3 120W AIRPLAY MCU BOARD", "LOGIC 3 HD120 AIRPLAY.050.08", "FR4 L2MM" and :"Kenwin Digital Technology Limited" appears to be silkscreened on the daughterboard. :The daughterboard has a ''[[CSR]]'' (57E6, 87CG, 207AE) IC.
A USB port is available on the device for charging purposes. :This device will dock with an ''iPhone'' / ''iPad'' / ''iPod''.
{{See also|Philips Fidelio SoundSphere (DS6800W)}}
[[Category:English Documentation]]
